keyword: how many calories in yuengling bock beer
title: How Many Calories in Yuengling Bock Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Yuengling Bock Beer per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick nutrition facts for this malty brew.
h1: How Many Calories in Yuengling Bock Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz bottle or serving; unfiltered bock style with typical malt profile; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and exact formulation. Check brewery labels or apps for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Yuengling Bock Beer contains about 165 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard beverage nutrition labels for easy reference.

tweaks.label: Served as a 16 oz pint (vs. 12 oz)
Switch to Yuengling Traditional Lager (lighter style)
Add a splash of fruit juice mixer (1 oz per serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Yuengling Bock Beer?
What are the carbs in Yuengling Bock Beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.5 g of carbs per 12 oz, with no fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Yuengling Bock Beer have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has about 1.5 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Yuengling Bock Beer?
Are there calories from alcohol in Yuengling Bock Beer?
faqs.a: Yes, alcohol contributes to the 165 kcal total, alongside malt carbs.
